body: I tried a test-build on a fairly minimal Debian Stretch (minimal + packages `git-core, curl, ca-certificates, python, procps, gcc, g++, file, make, patch, libc6-dev, xz-utils, lbzip2, sudo, ssh, unzip`) and encountered that `py-py{gobjects,gtk}` depend on `pkg-config`.
title: py-py{gobject,gtk} require pkgconfig for build
